title: fix: increase zIndex in PCBViewer for improved overlay handling
description: Increase the zIndex of the "Click to Interact" overlay in the PCBViewer component to improve its handling of overlays.

title: Added font_size
description: Added a new property `font_size` to the `SchematicText` type.

title: new SourceComponent property: internally_connected_source_port_ids
description: Adds a new property `internally_connected_source_port_ids` to the `SourceComponentBase` type.

title: Make schematic_component_id Optional for schematic_text
description: Make the `schematic_component_id` field optional for `SchematicText` objects.

title: Add the location of the missing component
description: Add the location of the missing component in the `SourceFailedToCreateComponentError` interface.

title: Add `source_failed_to_create_component_error`
description: Add a new error type `source_failed_to_create_component_error` to handle errors when a component fails to be constructed.

title: switching to nine point anchor
description: Switching the anchor system from a 5-point system to a 9-point system for schematic text.

title: cadModel can now be null
description: Allowing `cadModel` property to be `null`

title: added fontSize
description: Added a new `fontSize` property to the `schematic-text` component.

title: matched the props with cirucitJson type
description: Matched the props with circuitJson type

title: Added nine point anchor props
description: Added nine-point anchor props

title: added anchor and color to schematicTextProps for the <schematictext />
description: Added anchor and color properties to the `schematicTextProps` object in the `schematic-text.ts` file.

title: jumper props
description: Adds new properties (`pinCount` and `internallyConnectedPins`) to the `jumperProps` type to support 2-pin and 3-pin jumpers with different internal pin connections.

title: silkscreen for solderjumper
description: Adds silkscreen outline and reference text for solderjumper footprint

title: add support potentiometer_ca14_h5
description: Adds support for the potentiometer_ca14_h5 component.

title: fix: ordering for pinrows
description: Fixes the ordering for pinrows to prevent overlaps.

title: added start/end_pcb_port_id to help with connectivity map
description: Added `start_pcb_port_id` and `end_pcb_port_id` properties to the `route` object in the `solderjumper.ts` file.

title: refactor jumper for better connections
description: Refactor the jumper to have a variable trace width instead of a fixed width, which can cause problems.

title: Feat: each pin in pinrow ft has silkscreenRef
description: Adds silkscreen labels for each pin in the pinrow feature.

title: introduced solderjumper footprint
description: Introduced a new footprint for a "solderjumper" component.

title: fix z-axis rotation
description: Fix the z-axis rotation for the CAD component.

title: New bun-compatible dev command "dev2"
description: Adds a new "dev2" command to the Bun CLI, which is a simplified version of the existing "dev" command.

title: fixed solder jumper pins not mapping correctly & disable cadModel with empty string
description: Fixed solder jumper pins not mapping correctly and disabled `cadModel` with empty string.

title: Add `source_failed_to_create_component_error` to skip complete circuit render failure and add only the failed component to db
description: Adds a new `ErrorPlaceholder` component to handle cases where a component fails to create during the circuit rendering process.

title: fixed solderjumper not transforming with parent as layer changes
description: Fixed the issue where the solder jumper component was not transforming with its parent layer changes.

title: fix isPcbPrimitive incorrectly on schematic text
description: Fix the `isPcbPrimitive` property to be `isSchematicPrimitive` for `SchematicText` component.

title: Add event for tracking board render phase change (more efficient progress bar)
description: Adds an event for tracking the start of the board render phase, which can be used to implement a more efficient progress bar.

title: Fix Dependencies, move internal deps to peer deps
description: Fix Dependencies, move internal deps to peer deps

title: Jumper internallyConnectedPins are now actually connected
description: The PR fixes an issue where the internallyConnectedPins of a Jumper component were not actually connected.

title: Added font size blocking the circuit-to-svg PR
description: Adds font size to the NormalComponent and SchematicText components

title: New component : <schematictext /> & test
description: Adds a new component `SchematicText` and its test

title: updated footprinter
description: The PR updates the version of the `@tscircuit/footprinter` dependency in the `package.json` file.

title: new component: PcbTrace
description: Adds a new primitive component `PcbTrace` to the project.

title: fixed unwanted pin labels
description: Fixed unwanted pin labels on ports that had "left" or "right" port hints but didn't have them specified in the port name.

title: jumper generates solderjumper symbols
description: The pull request updates the `Jumper` component to generate different schematic symbol names based on the number of pins and whether the pins are internally connected.

title: Feat: Enable pinLabels silkscreen with pinrow footprint
description: Enables pinLabels silkscreen with pinrow footprint

title: fixed pitch & introduces innerDiameter and outerDiameter to FemaleHeader
description: The pull request fixes the pitch and introduces the `innerDiameter` and `outerDiameter` properties to the `FemaleHeader` component, allowing for more customization of the component.

title: fixed soic8 and tssop8
description: Fixed the 3D models for SOIC8 and TSSOP8 footprints.

title: add dependency check github action
description: Add a dependency check GitHub action to ensure repos properly maintain peer deps and dev deps.

title: add support solder paste for smtpads
description: Add support for solder paste for SMT pads

title: Fix Dependencies
description: This pull request fixes dependencies by updating the Dependency Check GitHub workflow and removing unused dependencies.

title: Only display pin1 indicator for chips, now as a filled up triangle instead of a notch
description: Change the pin1 indicator to be a filled up triangle instead of a notch.

title: Fix Dependencies
description: Fix dependencies by updating package.json and adding a dependency check workflow

title: updated circuit-json-to-connectivity-map
description: Updates the version of the "circuit-json-to-connectivity-map" dependency from 0.0.21 to 0.0.22.

title: updated connectivity map
description: Update the version of the "circuit-json-to-connectivity-map" dependency from 0.0.20 to 0.0.21.

title: symbols for all solderjumper3 variants
description: The pull request adds symbols for all solderjumper3 variants.

title: solderjumper2
description: Adds a new solderjumper2.json file with detailed path information.

title: solderjumper2_bridged12
description: The PR introduces a new circuit board element, a solder jumper bridge, with detailed path definitions.

title: Improve silkscreen text accuracy by adding the Uppercase characters height cap
description: Improves silkscreen text accuracy by adjusting the font size based on the uppercase characters height cap.

title: top & bottom silkscreen rotation + repro for the gerber fontsize
description: The pull request adds support for rotating top and bottom silkscreen text, and fixes a bug related to the gerber font size.

title: fixed rotated_rect not supported bug
description: Fixes a bug where "rotated_rect" shape is not supported in the Gerber aperture definition.

title: feat(gerber): add support for pill shape in gerber aperture generation
description: Add support for pill-shaped elements in the Gerber aperture generation process.

title: refactor middleware imports
description: The pull request refactors the middleware imports to use the correct path to the Middleware type.

title: Switched to ky from redaxios
description: Switched the HTTP client library from redaxios to ky.

title: add format and type-check workflows
description: Add format and type-check workflows for the project

title: Add pcb_trace end points to the connectivity map
description: Add pcb_trace end points to the connectivity map

title: handle internally_connected_source_port_ids
description: Adds support for handling `internally_connected_source_port_ids` in `source_component` objects for `getFullConnectivityMapFromCircuitJson()` and `getSourcePortConnectivityMapFromCircuitJson()` functions.

title: Dep update
description: Updates the dependency `@tscircuit/runframe` from version `0.0.446` to `0.0.449`.

title: Revert "fix: unmounting of the dropdown item"
description: Reverts the fix for the unmounting of the dropdown item.

title: Show sign in, when no user not logged in
description: Show sign in, when no user not logged in

title: Added skeleton on user's profile page and minor improvements
description: Added a skeleton loading component for the user's profile page and made minor improvements to the empty state messages.

title: fix: unmounting of the dropdown item
description: Fix for the unmounting of the dropdown item.

title: Added Optimized image, so that we show the fallback img when the image doesn't load
description: Added an optimized image component that shows a fallback image when the primary image doesn't load.

title: fix: dialog (dropdown) remains visible during navigation
description: Fix a bug where the dropdown menu remains visible during navigation.

title: refactor: remove redundant components and pages
description: The pull request removes redundant components and pages from the `src/App.tsx` file.

title: refactor: cleanup `SnippetCard` component
description: Refactor the `SnippetCard` component and remove its implementation from the codebase.

title: replace the  url`/snippets/images` with the `/packages/images` in the component
description: Replace the URL `/snippets/images` with `/packages/images` in the `PackageCard` component and add a new `CarouselItem` component to the `TrendingPackagesCarousel` component to fetch the package images with the updated URL.

title: added schematic-symbols as now it's a peer dependency in core
description: Added `schematic-symbols` as a peer dependency in the `package.json` file.

title: fix tscircuit.com repo link
description: Fix the incorrect repository link in the project's documentation.

title: Revert "refactor(TrendingPage): remove unused refetch and keepPreviousData options from useQuery"
description: Reverts the previous refactor that removed the `refetch` and `keepPreviousData` options from the `useQuery` hook in the `TrendingPage` component.

title: updated dep
description: Updated a dependency for the `circuit-json-to-gerber` package from version `0.0.19` to `0.0.21`.

title: refactor(TrendingPage): remove unused refetch and keepPreviousData options from useQuery
description: Remove unused `refetch` and `keepPreviousData` options from `useQuery` in the TrendingPage component.

title: refactor: streamline error handling and update snippet creation logic in JLCPCB component generation
description: This pull request refactors the error handling and updates the snippet creation logic in the JLCPCB component generation process.

title: Add fake for `/packages/images` with the `fs_sha` param
description: Adds a fake route for `/packages/images` with the `fs_sha` parameter to handle package image requests.

title: feat: enhance package deletion flow by refetching user packages after successful deletion
description: The pull request enhances the package deletion flow by refetching the user's packages after a successful deletion, ensuring the user interface reflects the latest package data.

title: add order button for mobile
description: Add an order button for mobile view of the package header

title: fix(CodeEditor): support react syntax for old .ts packages
description: Fix support for React syntax in old .ts packages in the CodeEditor component.

title: feat(CodeEditor): add state to track editor readiness
description: Introduce `isCodeEditorReady` state to manage editor opacity based on its readiness, improving user experience.

title: refactor: simplify package file updates in CodeAndPreview component
description: Refactors the `CodeAndPreview` component to simplify the way package file updates are handled.

title: feat: append  mainComponentPath for custom component runs
description: Append `mainComponentPath` for custom component runs.

title: refactor(CodeEditorHeader): logic to check if manual imports not used also add support for old spec file
description: The pull request refactors the `checkIfManualEditsImported` function to accept a `file` parameter, allowing it to check for manual edits in different entry points and file types. It also adds support for the old spec file format.

title: refactor: use `/packages/list_trending` to get rid of duplicates and cleanup
description: This pull request refactors the LandingHero component to use the `/packages/list_trending` endpoint to get the trending snippets, and removes the duplicated code.

title: updated dep
description: Update a dependency for the `circuit-json-to-gerber` package from version `0.0.18` to `0.0.19`.

title: Switch from `/snippets/list_latest` to `/packages/list_latest`
description: Switch the API endpoint from `/snippets/list_latest` to `/packages/list_latest` to return a list of the latest packages, excluding snippets.

title: Missed type error, getting the correct response for the packages
description: Fixes a type error in the code that was returning the wrong data for the packages.

title: refactor: replacing `/snippets/list` -> `/packages/list`
description: Refactor the code to replace `/snippets/list` with `/packages/list`.

title: feat: add PackageCard component and update trending page to use packages
description: This PR introduces a new `PackageCard` component and updates the trending page to use packages instead of snippets.

title: chore: runframe
description: Update the `@tscircuit/runframe` dependency to version `0.0.417`.

title: chore: runframe (Send shipping carrier to stripe)
description: Update the version of the `@tscircuit/runframe` package from `0.0.413` to `0.0.415`.

title: add fake for `/packages/list_trending`
description: Add a fake implementation for the `/packages/list_trending` endpoint in the testing environment.

title: chore: update circuit-json-to-gerber dependency to v0.0.18
description: Updates the `circuit-json-to-gerber` dependency to version 0.0.18.

title: chore: runframe
description: Update the `@tscircuit/runframe` dependency to version `0.0.412`.

title: add strokeDash support for svg generation
description: Add support for stroke-dasharray property in SVG generation

title: add option that allows setting background color
description: Add an option to set the background color for the SVG image.

title: Improved the outage table for mobile responsiveness
description: Improved the outage table for mobile responsiveness by adding more padding and whitespace to the table cells.

title: add resolve notification in outage channel when outage is resolved
description: Add a resolution notification in the outage channel when an outage is resolved.

title: fix: increase the wait timeout for the png_service check
description: Increase the wait timeout for the png_service check

title: remove package-lock.json
description: Remove the package-lock.json file

title: Fixed modal opening condition
description: Fixed the modal opening condition to check for the presence of an error attribute instead of checking for a specific CSS class.

title: chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.404
description: Update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.404

title: chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.402
description: Update the @tscircuit/core dependency to version 0.0.402

title: Make WebWorker a singleton (fixes test suite)
description: The pull request makes the WebWorker a singleton to fix the test suite.

title: patch core update
description: Update the version of the `@tscircuit/core` package from `0.0.400` to `0.0.401`.

title: Update Core, more efficient worker loading from blob urls, stop tracking anyEvent (too many events, causes segfaults)
description: Update Core, more efficient worker loading from blob urls, stop tracking anyEvent (too many events, causes segfaults)

title: Revert "chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.398"
description: Revert the update of the "@tscircuit/core" dependency to version 0.0.398

title: chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.398
description: Update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.398

title: chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.395
description: Update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.395

title: chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.394
description: Automated update of @tscircuit/core to v0.0.394.

title: test: add cleanup for web worker instances in test files
description: Ensures proper cleanup of web worker instances by adding `await worker.kill()` at the end of each test to prevent potential memory leaks and ensure tests run in a clean state.

title: ci: update GitHub Actions workflows to use latest versions
description: Update GitHub Actions workflows to use latest versions of `actions/checkout` and `oven-sh/setup-bun`.

title: Routing failure to simulate error tab not working, show pcb_autorouting_error in errors tab
description: Fix routing failure to simulate error tab not working, show pcb_autorouting_error in errors tab

title: add the isLoggedIn parameter, for the sign in dialog to show immediately
description: Added the `isLoggedIn` parameter to the `useOrderDialog` hook and the `OrderDialog` component, allowing the sign-in dialog to be shown immediately if the user is not logged in.

title: Update the api paramter to named parameter
description: Update the API parameter to a named parameter

title: fix: add the missing condition of not showing both the loader and error message
description: Fix the condition for not showing both the loader and error message in the OrderDialog component.

title: Add the sign-in view on the dialog if the user is not logged in
description: Add the sign-in view on the dialog if the user is not logged in

title: Adapt RunFrame to use board:renderPhaseStarted for progress estimation rather than renderable:renderLifecycle:anyEvent (prevents some crashes)
description: Adapts the RunFrame component to use the board:renderPhaseStarted event instead of the renderable:renderLifecycle:anyEvent event for progress estimation, which prevents some crashes.

title: minor tip adjustments
description: Minor adjustments to the tips displayed in the application

title: fix error tab not being displayed in the initial run
description: Fix error tab not being displayed in the initial run of the CircuitJsonPreview component.

title: fix: runtime cost undefined error
description: Fixes a runtime error related to the `orderQuote.shipping_options` property being undefined.

title: Show breakdown of the total cost from the order_quote
description: This pull request adds a breakdown of the total cost from the order quote, including the lowest shipping carrier cost and the original total cost without shipping.

title: Send the shipping carrier information to stripe
description: Send the shipping carrier information to stripe

title: edge case cover to show the loading state
description: Add edge case cover to show the loading state when fetching quotes

title: fix: `No quote available` error by simplifying this logic
description: Simplify the logic for handling errors and loading states in the `InitialOrder` component.

title: update the order-quote dialog
description: Update the UI and formatting of the order-quote dialog.

title: fix(cli): prevent --version/-V from printing version with subcommands
description: Fix to prevent the `--version/-V` flags from printing the version when used with subcommands.

title: feat(cli): add remove command for uninstalling tscircuit components
description: Adds a new remove command to the tscircuit CLI for uninstalling tscircuit components.

title: fix: Renaming files aren't picked up properly
description: Fix an issue where file renames are not properly picked up by the DevServer.

title: feat(cli): improve CLI update notifications with current version display
description: Improve CLI update notifications with current version display

title: feat(cli): enhance package search with interactive selection and installation
description: Enhance package search with interactive selection and installation

title: feat(cli): add search command to CLI for querying snippets
description: Add a search command to the CLI for querying snippets

title: patch: fix backslash normalization
description: Patch to fix backslash normalization in the `normalizePath` function.

title: add rename endpoint
description: Adds a new `renameFile` function to the `db-client.ts` file, which allows renaming a file by updating its `file_path` property and emitting `FILE_CREATED` and `FILE_DELETED` events.

title: Fix Dependencies
description: Fix dependencies by updating package.json and tsconfig.json

title: Better Pathing with accurate section cost function
description: The pull request adds comments with placeholders, uses section score as g in hyper capacity pathing section solver, adds a todo for starting score, updates the optimization schedule, adds a placeholder for cached hyper capacity pathing solver, and attempts to make the g score more efficient.

title: Better Capacity Pathing, More Cache Integration
description: The pull request updates the .gitignore file and adds a new JSON file containing details about capacity pathing and multi-section capacity pathing.

title: High Density Intra Node Solvers incorporate connMap (causes overlaid vias w/ same-net, but improves completion)
description: The pull request introduces changes to the High Density Intra Node Solvers to incorporate connMap, which causes overlaid vias with the same net but improves completion.

title: Path Optimization Schedule for MultiSectionPathing Solver, improve section visualization
description: Introduces a JSON file with detailed information about a capacity mesh node (cn27815) and its port points, including their coordinates and connection names.

title: New Autorouting Pipeline Debugger header to allow configuring cache
description: Adds a new Autorouting Pipeline Debugger header to allow configuring the cache provider, including options for In Memory, Local Storage, and None.
